name: OMSCustomerCare
0:
”Alexa open customer management system”
”I want to know my order status”
”Four zero zero zero zero one one seven”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: customer management system
des:
Provides the status of customer order by calling specific APIs used for specific organization.
Need to provide a specific customer order number of 8 digits to get order status.
e.g. we can use order number as 40000117 and can get the status for this order.
Order Status can be available, Cancel,ready and fulfilled.
Also order status we can get by using Registered phone number.
e.g. we can use phone number as 6854668546 and can get the status for this orders associated with this phone number.
After enabling the skill say things like "Alexa open customer management system".
Using this skill OMS users can track their orders.
